title: Sky Force Reloaded (PC/ Multi/ 2017/ ver.1.5 Repack)
description:
Title: Sky Force Reloaded
Genre: Action, Indie
Developer: Infinite Dreams
Publisher: Infinite Dreams
Release Date: 30 Nov, 2017

System Requirements!
OS: Windows® Vista/7/8/10
Processor: Dual core 2,4 GHz
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Graphics: GeForce 8600GTS or equivalent
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Storage: 500 MB available space
Additional Notes: Display resolution: 1280 x 720

Install Note

1. Download Game
2. Run setup.exe
3. Run with shortcut on the desktop

Sky Force Reloaded for PC / Windows is an old school shooter (frequently called shoot’ em up or shmup) inspired by arcade classics. The game was developed by Polish studio Infinite Dreams, the creators of two previous installments of the series – Sky Force released in 2004 and Sky Force 2014.

Mechanics

The basic gameplay mechanics remain the same. The player controls a small fighter jet which automatically flies to the top of the screen and fights hordes of enemies. Player must avoid hitting various obstacles and he must gather useful items. Some items provide additional bonuses while other equip the ship with better weapons.

The game is more interesting thanks to battles with powerful bosses and wide selection of weapons. Risky optional missions known from previous games in the series also returned during which the player must save civilians and receive great rewards for that
